product_name: Goal Zero Lighthouse 250 LED Lantern with Switch 8 Power Hub
long_description: Light up any situation with a Lighthouse 250 Lantern and power hub. It sheds bright, 250-lumen light and includes a solar / USB charger for prolonged use and for powering handhelds in the backcountry.
short_description: Light up any situation with a Lighthouse 250 Lantern and power hub. It sheds bright, 250-lumen light and includes a solar / USB charger for prolonged use and for powering handhelds in the backcountry.
